basics.label: Software Development Manager
basics.name: John R. Ailor
basics.cover: Please find enclosed my resume, which outlines my relevant experience for this position, as well as my education. I am an experienced Software Engineer with a demonstrated history of working in e-commerce, operations, and cloud computing. I am skilled in Software Architecture, Technical Writing, Software Development, and hold a Bachelor\textquotesingle s degree focused in Computer Engineering from Drexel University. I have gained over nine years of experience working with a full stack of web technologies and general back-end computing platforms. Over the course of my career I have had the opportunity to gain a great deal of experience writing technical reports and documenting software architecture. I have lead several teams through various projects, seen multiple projects go from idea to production under my supervision, and mentored numerous junior team members in their project goals. I consider myself a well rounded programmer with a focus on real world software applications that contribute to advancing productivity and business goals of the company or client for which I am working. I believe that any team I am given the opportunity to work with will find that I am a dedicated employee who looks for the best solution to any problem.
basics.summary: Enterprising Software Engineer with 9+ years of experience working to deliver sustainable applications focused around highly configurable, scalable, and capable designs. Managed the re-architecture of numerous business critical applications, both customer facing and operational. Eager to work closely with a new team in a management role to find the ideal solutions to software problems.

skills.name: Software/Applications
keywords: MS Office Suite with VB Macros

highlights: Major in Computer Engineering
Minor in Electrical Engineering
Minor in Business Administration

work.summary: Focused on Amazon Device Reverse Logistics to re-architecture existing hard coded warehouse systems to a configurable AWS server-less architecture
highlights: Redesigned, and Rearchitected all core services into a configurable orchestration service to replace hard-coded workflow system
Designed and managed a multi-team initiative, reducing the number of service teams involved in reverse logistics by a third
Pushed Team\textquotesingle s Operational Excellence forward with new upgraded technology stack proposals
Re-imagined teams agile process to include procedures and mechanisms to guarantee success; reduced sprint rollover by 75\pct
Introduced new tenants and goals for testing procedures to ensure tests were targeting and finding critical bugs within the existing architecture
Hosted bi-monthly organization wide learning series to educate on various emerging technologies and development topics
Mentored both projects and employees through initial stages of service design
Collaborated with managers and leaders within department to establish goals, mechanisms, and techniques for increased productivity
Managed product launches in each of the available reverse logistic regions
Participated in interviewing and hiring new candidates to the Amazon Software Development Team
Created a Points Poker application in response to Work From Home mandates to allow inclusive collaboration among team members in planning activities

work.summary: Worked across numerous business and technology spaces to deliver products for e-commerce team
highlights: Designed and managed the implementation of promotional engine for pricing service
Worked with a team of four developers to build and launch a new brand website; which handled 4 million monthly visitors after initial launch
Worked with a team of developers to build a product management system to be used with multiple brands; collectively handling about 26 million monthly visitors
Worked with multiple teams to oversee weekly deployment cycle and ensure compatibility between all existing and new micro-service operations
Worked with QA team to integrate a new QA UI Test developer into development team and create a UI Test Suite
Helped to migrate legacy data from third party system to in-house solution using data migration scripts written in Python

work.summary: Designed and implemented a scalable Backend-as-a-Service infrastructure while managing developers across numerous teams
highlights: Managed a team of eight programmers and a graphic artist through multiple primary projects
Worked as team lead for Backend as a Service project designed to support applications created at small companies
Managed personnel and project resource allocation for server-side technology department

work.summary: Co-founded a small company to fill a perceived market gap in apartment rental visualization, using priority tooling and technologies to expand efficiently while maintaining a small staff
highlights: Acquired 50+ nation wide clients specializing in off-campus student housing in 15 states
Innovated 3D modeling process, using CAD software, resulting in a sustained national commercial endeavor
Expanded process to meet market needs and developed a staff to meet demand as business expanded
Migrated a ASP.NET MVC website from Rackspace hosting server to an AWS EC2 instance for non-profit organization
Worked with a design team to build a cross platform mobile theme in CSS and JS which was deployed to internal teams (SAPUI5)
Coordinated with numerous departments to gather requirements and develop internal department pages (SAP Portal)
Built and updated department specific pages on the SAP internal social network (SAP JAM) after gathering requirements from VP level
Trained business users in the use of HTML for the basic purpose of intranet editing in order to ensure continued maintenance of system content
Maintained multiple external and internal applications
Integrated updated intranet with existing version in order to ensure compatibility with Microsoft SharePoint
Designed and organized layout of new and existing web pages built on ASP.NET VB and Microsoft SharePoint
Worked to modernize CSS and JS on existing applications
Converted database centric proprietary Rental Management System and Tenant portal from ASP.net 1.1 to 4.0 utilizing code behind and Master Pages in VB and C++
Simultaneously updated database from SQL Server 2000 to SQL Server 2008 and standardized table and stored procedure naming conventions
Photographed buildings and edited images in Photoshop in order to further renters\textquotesingle interest
Helped introduce semi-agile work-flow with focus on pair-programming using VisualSVN for Visual Studio
Managed Audio and Visual technology for the church services, and band performances
Installed, upgraded, and maintained audio production equipment for three venues
Worked with church committee to ensure funding and budget for audio engineering team
Mentored and trained replacements on how to operate soundboard and audio technology
Oversaw installation of two projectors and projector screens for visualization of services
Organized and ensure smooth operations during events and services including personnel management
